metadata.title: External Thermal Insulation - S2PI
metadata.description: External thermal insulation solutions with our innovative iTarn products and projection systems.
metadata.keywords: external thermal insulation, iTarn, thermal projection, energy savings

hero.title: External Thermal Insulation
hero.subtitle: Innovative thermal projection solutions to optimize the energy performance of your buildings

introduction.title: External thermal insulation
introduction.subtitle: A high-performance solution for energy efficiency
introduction.paragraph1: External thermal insulation (ETI) represents a leading technical solution for improving building energy performance. Our projection products enable rapid and effective implementation, ensuring optimal insulation continuity.
introduction.paragraph2: Thanks to our innovative technologies like iTarn and INNOSPRAY systems, we offer solutions adapted to all types of supports and architectural configurations.

energy.title: Energy Performance
energy.description: Significant reduction in thermal losses and heating costs.

speed.title: Rapid Application
speed.description: Projection implementation allowing considerable time savings.

continuity.title: Insulation Continuity
continuity.description: Elimination of thermal bridges through continuous application.

durability.title: Durability
durability.description: Sustainable solutions with excellent long-term performance.

itarn.name: iTarn
itarn.description: Innovative thermal insulation solution by projection for building exteriors.

innosprayFTH.name: INNOSPRAY FTH
innosprayFTH.description: Fibrous projection product for high-performance thermal insulation.
